rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Welcome back. Your floppy friends here
filled me in on everything. You did good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Just watch yourself out there, Big Shot.
You're still new at this, and we can't afford to lose ya.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0003
rows.name: We only got so many spare parts to go around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0004
rows.name: Feeling better, are we? You took a nasty hit, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0005_m
rows.name: He'll be fine. I patched him up myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0005_f
rows.name: She'll be fine. I patched her up myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0006
rows.name: That's great, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0007
rows.name:
We were worried sick, you know? We're still new in town,
so we don't have many other friends here yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0008
rows.name: Wait... Then Ma-non will live here, too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Correct. The NLA government has reached an accord
with the Ma-non people. A friendship treaty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0010
rows.name:
It guarantees their safety and provides them
a place to settle here in the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0011
rows.name:
That's great to hear, Director General.
I wasn't sure how you'd react.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Mmm. "We don't need to be from the same species
to be able to recognize our common ground."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0013
rows.name: Someone told me that once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Heh—that was a lifetime ago.
That's quite a memory you have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0015
rows.name: A blessing and a curse, believe me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0016
rows.name: So you're all stuck here too, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0017
rows.name:
We were just cruising along out in space, you know?[ST:page p1=60 ]And suddenly our nav system goes all screwy
and we find ourselves here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Which is pretty weird, considering our tech
is far more advanced than anything Samaar's got...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0019
rows.name: You saw how bad they wanted it, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0020
rows.name: Samaar? ...I thought it was the Ganglion that attacked you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0021
rows.name:
You don't know about Samaar? Seriously?
As in the interstellar federation, Samaar?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0022
rows.name:
I mean, they only rule over a radius of
6 million light years or so of space.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0023
rows.name: Six MILLION?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0023_2
rows.name: But...that would span multiple galaxies...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0024
rows.name: Well, yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0025
rows.name:
The Ganglion are a run-of-the-mill crime syndicate.
Just one tiny part of Samaar, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0026
rows.name: Hmm... Just one tiny part...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0027
rows.name:
My good Ma-non—in the spirit of our agreement,
we'd appreciate any intelligence you'd be willing to share.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0028
rows.name:
Of course, of course! We'll tell you all we know, okay?
After all, we are friends now, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0029
rows.name:
We are, right? Friends?
Earth human heroes will protect us, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0030
rows.name: Because we live here now......right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0031
rows.name: Oh look, look! Here comes our little ship now.[ST:wait ]
